news.title: RAZERSTORE REWARDS
news.text: US$10 off* and a bonus of 1,000 Razer Silver

advertisements.advText: Gear up for battle with our exclusive line of UNSC-sanctioned peripherals—forged for PC and Xbox in the image of the iconic Mjolnir Powered Assault Armor worn by the Master Chief.
Gear up for battle with our exclusive line of UNSC-sanctioned peripherals—forged for PC and Xbox in the image of the iconic Mjolnir Powered Assault Armor worn by the Master Chief.
